item.description:
Got loads of pickled beets but no kraut? Got dilly beans but no grape jelly? Take some of your abundance and turn it into pantry diversity!!!

Join us for another great SWAP event for our local permaculture group.... This time share the bounty of your pantry and bring some jellies, jams, pickles, ferments or portions of dehydrated foods that you've created. The rules are simple: label all your items with ingredients, your name and date of preservation and go home with the same quantity of items that you brought! No cash changes hands.

This will be a two-hour +/- event and a Portland location will be chosen based on RSVP numbers. We will update details closer to the day but plan on sampling some of Local Sprouts' delicious offereings while we trade food preservation tips and recipes and generally socialize while stocking the larder.

group.name: Portland Maine Permaculture & The Resilience Hub

item.name: SWAP: Jellies, Jams, Pickles, Ferments
